title: Cautious Economic Observer
description: We maintain a relationship of moderate caution, with a TrustScore of 32.1 indicating some wariness but not outright distrust. As the Consiglio, I observe her entrepreneurial activities with interest, particularly noting her calculated approach to trade and advancement that aligns with Venice's economic stability. While no formal business arrangements currently connect us, I recognize her growing influence within the Facchini class and monitor her financial growth as she navigates between her working-class roots and emerging commercial ambitions.
